values.description: Textile Design UK is a company that designs and produces knitwear for fashion and the home. All materials are sourced within the British Isles, for example: Superfine Lamaine from Scotland, Merino from Yorkshire, Cotton from Lancashire, and each product is hand-made and hand-finished at a studio in Brighton & Hove. All designs are original taking inspiration only from nature through the eyes of Andrea Dunne herself.

Carlos loves drawing in his sketch book and making fantastical images for people. If you would like to discuss a commission you have for Carlos, please get in touch. *~*

values.description:
Sussex Community Foundation raises funds from Sussex people and businesses for local charities and community groups across East Sussex, West Sussex and Brighton & Hove.
We support people and companies to make the maximum impact with their local charitable giving. We started work in 2006 and  we have given out over £6 million to 1,500 charities and community groups since then.
We are also building an endowment fund to provide sustainable funding for the voluntary sector in Sussex into the future. That endowment is currently worth over £6 million.

values: Advice on philanthropy and local giving

values.name: Sussex Community Foundation

values.description:
4Delivery (4D) is a well-established, fully integrated Joint Venture bringing together the skills and experience of three industry-leading partners, Veolia Water, Costain and MWH. 

From optioneering, design and construction through to optimisation, operation and maintenance, we offer global expertise to deliver integrated, local outcome based solutions to the water industry.  

Incorporated in 2005 to deliver a part of Southern Waters AMP4 (2005-2010) programme of works, we have since successfully delivered over £1bn of environmental improvements across AMP4 and AMP5, including a £240m scheme to build a new wastewater treatment works and associated infrastructure to serve the Brighton and Hove catchment. 

We are now looking to bring our extensive range of services and capabilities to a wider market.
values.name: 4Delivery

values.description:
Gehl Architects is an urban research and design consultancy based in Copenhagen, Denmark, founded in 2000 by Architect Helle Søholt and Professor Jan Gehl.

Gehl Architects addresses global trends with a people-focused approach, utilizing empirical analysis to understand how the built environment can promote human flourishing. They apply this analysis to strategic planning and human-centered design to empower citizens, decision makers, company leaders, and organizations.

The work of Gehl Architects builds on Jan Gehl’s 40 years of extensive research on life in public space. Along with new research this continues to provide the foundation for their work in small and large cities around the world. Gehl Architects offers expertise in the fields of architecture, urban design and city planning. Their work is based on the human dimension – the built environment’s effect on activity patterns and interaction between people.

Gehl Architects’ interdisciplinary team of 35 people include architects, urban designers, landscape architects, graphic designers, sociologists, anthropologists and cultural theorists. Additionally, they employ a network of internationally recognized urban experts. 

Gehl Architects has worked with cities of all scales throughout the world. Clients include: Municipality of Copenhagen, Department of Transportation (DOT) in New York City, Melbourne City Council, The Energy Foundation in Beijing, China, Brighton & Hove City Council in the UK, City of Christchurch in New Zealand, Institute of Genplan in Moscow, among many others.

address.street1: Gl. Kongevej 1, DK 1610 Copenhagen V, Denmark

values.name: Gehl Architects

values.description:
Inspire Entertainment is a unique music promotions firm responding to an evolving music market.  It distinctively combines the disciplines of a record label, branding firm and music agency.

Inspire Entertainment emotionally fortifies brands and creates new meaningful revenue streams for retail franchises, corporations and charities.

We bring together recording artists and retail franchises -- leveraging their brands to create extraordinary opportunities for artists and businesses.

With many of our clients, we distribute hit CDs to non-traditional music markets -- and create custom compilation CDs.

And we do it better than anyone in the country.

Our secret sauce is in the combustion of our peerless credentials and relationships in both the branding and music worlds.

Our principals have spearheaded many of the most celebrated branding/promotion campaigns for companies including JCPenney, Whole Foods, CB Richard Ellis, Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, Legg Mason, Visa, UPS, Buca di Beppo Restaurants, Amgen, Mothers Work, Kimberly-Clark, Bell Telephone, The Grove, St. Joseph's Aspirin, along with many, many more.

Through strong, trusted relationships with all the major music labels, leading independent labels and global publishing companies, Inspire has the ability to engage most leading artists, and license and distribute almost all CDs and songs in the world.

One core competency is our unparalleled packaging of and expertise in custom CDs; showcasing our passionate team of nationally award-winning graphic designers and business writers.

Our campaigns hove proudly substantially contributed to numerous charities around the world, including: the City of Hope, National Alliance of Breast Cancer Organization, JCPenney Afterschool, Children's Hospital Los Angeles, and House Ear Institute, along with many, many more.

Emotionally branding companies, artists and charities.

That's Inspire Entertainment.
values.name: Inspire
Invitation Media Ltd
values.description:
The Invitation Book is a discount voucher and savings directory that can help you save hundreds of pounds on going out in your area. It is published annually in 9 regional editions. Each book is packed with a multitude of significant discounts (2 for 1, 25% off, etc) for the best local leisure, entertainment and dining establishments.

The Invitation Book and all associated products are produced by Invitation Media Ltd., with head offices based in Bristol.

The company was set up in 2003 by publishers Scott Davidson, Sam Oliphant, Dougal Templeton and Jo Kennedy, with the aim of raising over £1 million for good causes in every region that has an Invitation book. A secondary target was to have a book established in every major city and region throughout the UK and in 2008 there were books in the following areas:

Bristol, Bath & West 
Coventry & Warwickshire 
Birmingham, Solihull & West Midlands 
Cardiff, Newport & South Wales 
Nottingham & Derby 
The Black Country 
In 2009, the following editions are available:

Southampton & Portsmouth 
Brighton, Hove & West Sussex 
Reading, Oxford & The Thames Valley 
As with anything new, it does take time for people to get used to the idea that you really can buy £1,000's worth of fantastic offers and savings for less than £30… but believe us, there are no catches, no hidden costs or prohibitive terms and conditions.

We would love to claim this as an original concept. But like all great ideas, it's inspired by others. There are many similar books around the world but it's 'Entertainment' founded in Detroit, USA by Hughes and Sheila Potiker in 1962, which is the most successful. It's now published in more than 200 markets across Canada, USA, Australia, New Zealand and Asia with more than 8 million books sold in 2004. As well as each book delivering $1,000's in voucher and dining savings, it also works as a community fundraiser - $90 million was raised last year for local good causes from the sale of USA 'Entertainment' books alone.

Having recently moved to larger offices in Bristol and with a dedicated and hardworking team, Invitation Media Ltd. continues to expand its client database of members, discount promotion partners and fundraisers, always with the clear aim of helping make a difference in the local community.

If you are interested in the book, or ways in which we can help you, why don't you make an appointment and come have a coffee and chat, we would be more than happy to see you.

De Nederrijn Groep bestaat uit verschillende facilitaire bedrijven: Nederrijn Schoonmaak, Personel Services en Hove Groenvoorziening. Allemaal bedrijven die uw facilitaire zorgen professioneel uit handen nemen, zodat u er geen omkijken naar heeft.

De Nederrijn Groep werkt vanuit een regionale gedachte. Door korte communicatielijnen zijn we flexibel en intensief betrokken bij onze opdrachtgevers. Dit wordt nog eens versterkt door de verantwoordelijkheden zo laag mogelijk in de organisatie te leggen. De verschillende bedrijven functioneren volledig autonoom onder leiding van gespecialiseerd management.

Naast de gespecialiseerde bedrijven op facilitair gebied biedt Nederrijn haar opdrachtgevers ook een loket voor alle overige facilitaire diensten. Dit Total Facility Concept betreft zowel de operationele uitvoering, als de begeleiding en het organiseren van een uitbesteding. De Nederrijn Groep adviseert en koopt in daar waar het voordelig is voor de opdrachtgever. Niet alleen financieel maar ook organisatorisch passend bij uw organisatie.
values.name: Nederrijn Groep

Chambers Wade HR Services is a Human Resources consultancy covering London, East and West Sussex and Brighton and Hove. We work with senior HR leaders to deliver HR projects and consultancy services.
